metadata.Description: Collaboration and exchange of resources, knowledge, and expertise among developing countries (South-South cooperation) and between developing countries and other partners (triangular cooperation).

entities.Description: Markets where electricity, natural gas, and other energy commodities are bought and sold.
Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
Climate finance mechanisms refer to the various financial instruments and mechanisms that are used to mobilize and allocate funds for climate change mitigation and adaptation projects.
The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.
The process of capturing and storing energy for later use.
Organizations that focus on energy issues within a specific region.

relations.Description: South-South and triangular cooperation employs capacity building programs to enhance knowledge and skills in sustainable energy.
relations.Subject: south-south and triangular cooperation

relations.Description: South-South and triangular cooperation collaborates with international organizations to promote sustainable energy cooperation among developing countries.
relations.Subject: south-south and triangular cooperation

relations.Description: South-South and triangular cooperation supports research in renewable energy technologies to foster innovation and knowledge sharing.
relations.Subject: south-south and triangular cooperation

relations.Description: South-South and triangular cooperation administers climate finance programs to support sustainable energy projects in developing countries.
relations.Subject: south-south and triangular cooperation

relations.Description: South-South and triangular cooperation measures energy efficiency performance to track progress and identify areas for improvement.
relations.Subject: south-south and triangular cooperation

relations.Description: South-South and triangular cooperation aligns with the Sustainable Development Goals to promote sustainable energy access and development.
relations.Subject: south-south and triangular cooperation

relations.Description: South-South and triangular cooperation is an instance of international cooperation for sustainable energy development.
relations.Subject: south-south and triangular cooperation
regional energy organizations
relations.Description: Regional energy organizations implement energy efficiency policies to promote sustainable energy practices.

relations.Subject: regional energy organizations
relations.Description: Regional energy organizations provide funding for renewable energy projects to support the transition to clean energy sources.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

relations.Subject: climate finance mechanisms
relations.Description: Climate finance mechanisms implement building standards that promote sustainable and energy-efficient construction practices.

relations.Subject: climate finance mechanisms
relations.Description: Climate finance mechanisms provide funding for renewable energy projects to support the transition to clean and sustainable energy sources.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency collaborates with industries to develop and implement energy-saving measures and technologies.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

relations.Subject: energy markets
relations.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

relations.Subject: energy poverty indices
relations.Description: Energy poverty indices implement energy access programs to provide affordable and reliable energy services to underserved communities.
